Package PoetryGenerator.Generator

Class PoemGeneratorEA

  • java.lang.Object
    • PoetryGenerator.Generator.PoemGeneratorEA
  • public class PoemGeneratorEA
extends java.lang.Object
    Evolutionary algorithm to find the highest scoring poem in terms of grammaticality, poeticness and meaningfulness Goal: maximise cost of candidate solutions
    Version:
    26/04/19
    Author:
    Clare Buckley

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      private java.lang.String addRhyme​(java.lang.String poem)
      Add rhyme to poem using RhymeGenerator Poems with rhyming couples will be rewarded with a greater cost If no rhyme is found, original word will be returned
      java.math.BigDecimal evaluateFinalPopulation()
      Evaluate final population after all generations have been completed Population with the greatest cost will be returned as the 'best poem'
      private void evolve()
      Go through number of generations and improve potential solutions

      Create child from two parent candidates using crossover

      private void initialisePopulationProbabilities()
      Get probabilities for each poem in the population
      static void main()
      Main method to run the system.
      private void oneGeneration()
      One generation of the algorithm Add child to population, and mutate both child and another poem in the population if the mutation probability is met.

                 throws java.io.IOException

             throws java.io.IOException

        java.io.IOException

      • oneGeneration

        private void oneGeneration()
                    throws java.io.IOException
        One generation of the algorithm Add child to population, and mutate both child and another poem in the population if the mutation probability is met. Child: crossover of two parents Mutation: selected poems have grammar fixed using LanguageTool and rhyme is added using RhymeGenerators
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • generateCrossover

        public java.lang.String generateCrossover​(java.lang.String parent1,
                                          java.lang.String parent2)
        Create child from two parent candidates using crossover
        Parameters:
        parent1 - - parent selected from population using tournament selection
        parent2 - - parent selected from population using tournament selection
        Returns:
        child poem consisting of both parent1 and parent2

      • tournamentParentSelection

        private java.lang.String tournamentParentSelection()
        Select one parent from the poem with highest probability from a subgroup of the population
        Returns:
        strongest parent from tournament

      • addRhyme

        private java.lang.String addRhyme​(java.lang.String poem)
        Add rhyme to poem using RhymeGenerator Poems with rhyming couples will be rewarded with a greater cost If no rhyme is found, original word will be returned
        Parameters:
        poem - : poem to add rhyme to
        Returns:
        poem with added rhyme

      • fixGrammar

        public java.lang.String fixGrammar​(java.lang.String poem)

        Fix grammar of poem using LanguageTool
        Parameters:
        poem - : poem to be corrected
        Returns:
        poem with corrected grammar
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • replaceWithSuggestion

        private java.lang.String replaceWithSuggestion​(java.lang.String line,
                                               int from,
                                               int to,
                                               java.util.List<java.lang.String> suggestions)
        Replace incorrect grammar with suggestions
        Parameters:
        line - - whole line containing error
        from - - start index of error
        to - - end index of error
        suggestions - - possible ways to correct issue
        Returns:
        word to replace original with

      • evaluateFinalPopulation

        public java.math.BigDecimal evaluateFinalPopulation()
        Evaluate final population after all generations have been completed Population with the greatest cost will be returned as the 'best poem'
        Returns:
        cost of the best poem

        Removes weakest poem from the population
        Parameters:
        candidates - : whole population
        Returns:
